characters.name: Winnie the Poohhh
characters.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.

characters.name: Tigger
characters.quote: My spelling is Wobbly. It's good spelling but it Wobbles, and the letters get in the wrong places.

characters.name: Piglet
characters.quote: You never can tell with bees.

characters.name: Eeyore
characters.quote: Some people care too much. I think it's called love.

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.quote: If the person you are talking to doesn't appear to be listening, be patient. It may simply be that he has a small piece of fluff in his ear.

characters.name: Kanga
characters.quote: It's so much more friendly with two.

characters.name: Roo
characters.quote: How sweet to be a Cloud Floating in the Blue!

characters.name: Owl
characters.quote: He could see the honey, he could smell the honey, but he couldnâ€™t quite reach the honey.

characters.name: Christopher Robin
characters.quote: It is hard to be brave, when you're only a Very Small Animal.
